main.name: Nick Perez
main.occupation: Bay Area based Full Stack Web Developer & Entrepreneur
main.description: "They say he has skills coding and experience in business&marketing"
main.bio: 'Hello World'. You have  caught this guy   in the midst of his career journey equipped with the tools of a full stack web developer and the lessons learned while working in sales and marketing . In his most recent adventure he promoted local government initiatives and got support for them. Prior to that he was seen working for Open Water  contributing to the  development of various code bases for the startups the company was backing . Over the past he has been given the oppurtunity to code for some amazing companies and startups utlimately finding his niche  coding in Javascript and its libaries. He has built everything from  custom API's with node , mobile apps with React Native, and  websites like this one using React. When he wasnt coding on his journey, he was busy performing a variety of roles in sales and marketing . His notes show that he has accumulated over a decades worth of experience within the retail sales and marketing world doing everything from direct sales to store operations to regional management.  Fast forward to today ,  he now finds himself looking for a new path and is currently looking to find a role that allows him to utilize everything he has to offer and feels that a customer success engineer position would be ideal.
main.contactmessage: Shoot me an email if you have any questions or know of any oppurtunities
